item.title: What Age Do Musicians Die at
item.description: A look at the distributions of musicians' ages of death for different causes of death, musical genres and instruments played, visualized with Google Chart Tools.

item.title: GitHub Commit Map
item.description: A geographic map that displays location information extracted from GitHub commit data grouped by the countries of the world.

item.title: Web Browser Word Clouds from GitHub Commit Messages
item.description: Visualization of GitHub commit messages with web browser mentions as word clouds created with the D3.js JavaScript library.

item.title: Exploring Expressions of Emotions in GitHub Commit Messages
item.description: An exploration of expressions of emotions, issues and swearing in GitHub commit messages based on data from the GitHub Archive accessed via Google BigQuery.

item.title: Mining the Social Web
item.description: A review of the book Mining the Social Web about collecting, analyzing, and visualizing data from social networks like Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
